TopicTitle: A cool feature that i found

Articles.Content:
so i was playin around and then i decided to press shift, something cool happend

so this is to shift kerbals between ladders, never knew that thing existed

https://imgur.com/a/92gmf0h

this is stock btw
Yes, you can make them leap to the side.
Well heck, I've been playing for 10 years and I didn't know that.   Cool.
well i guess cinematic guys can do cooler shots now
